sentences.sContent: The government thinks it can get away with token gestures on environmental issues.
sentences.sCn: 政府以为它在环境问题上做个样子就能敷衍过去。

sentences.sContent: ...Quotas force firms either to pad their boards with token non-executive directors...

synos.tran: 象征的；表意的；作为对某事的保证的

phrases.pCn: 令牌环（一个环状的区域网路）
令牌传递，令牌传送；通行令牌

trans.tranCn: 象征性的， 装样子的
trans.tranOther: a token action, change etc is small and not very important, and is usually only done so that someone can pretend that they are dealing with a problem

trans.tranCn: 筹码；信物，标志，纪念品；代金券，礼券
trans.tranOther: a round piece of metal that you use instead of money in some machines
